name: Contact360
description: Generated wrapper for Postman assets in docs_ai_agent/media/postman

info.name: Contact360 API
info.description: Postman collection for the Contact360 FastAPI backend. Core business logic (Authentication, Users, Contacts, Companies, Billing, Usage) is now handled by Connectra service. This collection includes v1 endpoints (Imports, Bulk), v2 endpoints (AI Chat, Apollo, Email, Email Patterns, LinkedIn, Exports, Gemini REST endpoint, Activities), v3 endpoints (S3 Files, Cleanup, Email Pattern, Analysis, Validation), and v4 endpoints (Sales Navigator scraping). Note: For GraphQL API, Gemini operations are now available through the AI Chats module. All endpoints require Bearer token authentication via Connectra. Sample parameters align with docs/api/ai_chat.md, docs/api/apollo.md, docs/api/email.md, docs/api/pattern.md, docs/api/linkdin.md, docs/api/export.md, docs/api/insert.md, docs/api/scrape.md, docs/api/s3.md, docs/api/cleanup.md, docs/api/email_pattern.md, docs/api/analysis.md, docs/api/validation.md, and docs/api/activities.md.

request.description: Return API metadata such as project name, version, and documentation URL.
Health probe served under the versioned API prefix.
Unversioned health check defined in app/main.py.
Database connection pool health check endpoint.

item.name: v1 API
item.description: API v1 endpoints for contacts, companies, imports, and bulk operations.

query.description: Maximum number of results per page

request.description: List contacts with filtering, pagination, and sorting. Supports comprehensive filtering by title, seniority, department, location, email status, and more.
Get detailed information about a specific contact by UUID.
Get count of contacts matching filter criteria.
Stream contacts in JSONL or CSV format for large datasets.
Create a new contact. Requires authentication.
List companies with filtering, pagination, and sorting.
Get detailed information about a specific company by UUID.
Get count of companies matching filter criteria.
Stream companies in JSONL or CSV format for large datasets.
Create a new company. Requires authentication.
Import contacts from CSV file. Returns job_id for status tracking.
Get status of an import job by job_id.
Create multiple contacts in a single request.
Update multiple contacts in a single request.

item.name: v2 API
item.description: API v2 endpoints for authentication, users, AI chat, Apollo integration, exports, LinkedIn, email services, and more.

request.description: Register a new user account and receive access tokens. Tokens are automatically saved to collection variables.
Authenticate a user and receive access tokens. Tokens are automatically saved to collection variables.
Get new access token using refresh token. Tokens are automatically updated in collection variables.
Get current authenticated user details.
List all users (admin only).
Get current user's profile information.
Update current user's profile.
Delete a user account (admin only).
List user's AI chat conversations.
Create a new AI chat conversation. Chat ID is automatically saved to collection variable.
Get AI chat details and messages.
Send a message to AI chat and get response.
Update an AI chat conversation.
Delete an AI chat conversation.
Analyze an Apollo.io URL and return structured parameter breakdown.
Analyze Apollo URL and return parameter breakdown with contact counts.
Search contacts using Apollo.io URL parameters.
Count contacts matching Apollo.io URL parameters.
List user's export jobs.
Create a contact export job. Export ID and download URL are automatically saved.
Create a company export job.
Get status of an export job.
Download completed export file.
Look up LinkedIn profile information.
Process CSV and find/verify emails. Creates/updates contacts and companies.
List all email patterns.
Create a new email pattern.
Get email pattern details by ID.
Update an existing email pattern.
Delete an email pattern.
Send message to Google Gemini AI.
Get user's billing information.
Update billing details.
Get user's API usage statistics.
List user activities.
Get geolocation data for an IP address.

item.name: v3 API
item.description: API v3 endpoints for S3 file operations, data cleanup, email pattern retrieval, data analysis, and data validation.

item.name: S3 Files
item.description: S3 file operations for listing, retrieving metadata, and reading CSV files from S3 buckets.

request.description: List all CSV files in the S3 bucket with their metadata.
Get metadata/information about a specific CSV file in S3. The file_id parameter must be the full S3 object key.

query.description: Maximum number of rows to return (1-1000)

request.description: Get paginated CSV file data from S3. Returns rows as dictionaries.

item.name: Cleanup
item.description: Data cleanup operations for cleaning and normalizing contact and company data.

request.description: Clean and normalize a single contact and its metadata.
Clean and normalize multiple contacts in a single request.
Clean and normalize a single company and its metadata.
Clean and normalize multiple companies in a single request.

item.name: Email Pattern
item.description: Email pattern operations for retrieving email patterns associated with contacts.

request.description: Get email pattern information for a single contact.

item.name: Get Email Patterns for Batch of Contacts

request.description: Get email pattern information for multiple contacts.

item.name: Analysis
item.description: Data analysis operations for analyzing data quality of contacts and companies.

request.description: Analyze a single contact's data quality.
Analyze multiple contacts in a single request.
Analyze a single company's data quality.
Analyze multiple companies in a single request.

item.name: Validation
item.description: Data validation operations for validating contact and company data quality.

Versioned API base path for v3 endpoints (S3 Files, Cleanup, Email Pattern, Analysis, Validation).
Versioned API base path for v4 endpoints (Sales Navigator scraping).

JWT refresh token obtained from login or register endpoints. Automatically set by test scripts.
Example contact UUID for detail routes.

Placeholder job identifier for import status checks.
